org.jerkar.depmanagement
Class JkScopedDependency

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.depmanagement.JkScopedDependency

public final class JkScopedDependency
extends java.lang.Object

A dependency specifying in which scope it should be used. Scopes can be declared as simple scopes or as a scope mapping.
